channel.title: Re creation of runescape in 2007
channel.description:
I am starting a project with some of my buddies. It is a recreation of runescape in 07. so it will be exactly like how runescape was back at that date. when it was the fun runescape.
So here are my questions:
Do you think this would fail? How long would it take? How popular would it be if it was completed?
all replys and answers are appreciated

item.title: Re creation of runescape in 2007
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

pyroshell:

this would fail

Read full topic

item.title: Re creation of runescape in 2007
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:22, topic:348458”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=444837.msg3268502#msg3268502 date=1279042743]

Hate to tell you but many have tried… and many, sadly, have failed. Runescape is nearly unrecreatable. This would take all every once of your time to get every little detail, from monster stats, to doors, ladders, or ships. But in any case, I wish you luck.

I haven’t failed yet. Just one little flaw kept me from releasing p377.

_> It was getting pretty damn close to RuneScape 2005
[/quote]

Quests? Npc dialogue?[/quote]

I had gotten as far as NPC dialogue. I completed Tutorial Island along with Prospecting. The only thing I hadn’t finished was hint-icons.

I was finishing NPC spawns and such that when it was almost complete (for beta testing, quests and other activities would be in progress during this stage) our VPS blue-screened and all progress was lost. I only have about 1/4th of the progress made in about 1 months time.

Read full topic

Hate to tell you but many have tried… and many, sadly, have failed. Runescape is nearly unrecreatable. This would take all every once of your time to get every little detail, from monster stats, to doors, ladders, or ships. But in any case, I wish you luck.

item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ

@SilentCJ wrote:

Not really a recreation then.

Guessing you’re not going into quests?
That’s kind of a big area to do.

item.title: Re creation of runescape in 2007
item.dc:creator: @pyroshell pyroshell
item.description:
@pyroshell wrote:

[quote=“Mitko, post:17, topic:348458”][quote author=pyroshell link=topic=444837.msg3267878#msg3267878 date=1278985161]
Im not going to go that far into detail. Just like the areas and stuff. and the npc’s in that area. Not the ladders and tunnels and stuff.

Thank you for wishing me luck
[/quote]So you’re saying all you’re gonna do is spawn the npcs? That is no recreation.[/quote]

Nope i am going to put everything in its area. and i was using the npc’s as an example. Im not going to go to far in to detail like all the tunnels and ladders and stuff. Just the general stuff

Read full topic

[/quote]
